title: New Independent Living 55+ Community with W/D. 1 BR Available!
map_address: 10940 Crooked Lake Blvd. NW near 111th Ave. NW
app_fee: $25 application fee per applicant + $300 application deposit
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Independent Senior Living - Lease these gorgeous one, two and three bedrom apartment homes at River North in Coon Rapids.', 'Our independent 55+ apartment living community captures the essence of living well.', 'The community amenities are unmatched, with heated underground parking, a nicely equipped fitness room, a beauty salon, a clubroom with full kitchen, a private library, a crafts room, and even a theatre room.', 'Enjoy the comforts of maintenance-free living along with the convenience of an outstanding location!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Enjoy the following features and more in your apartment home.', '- Fitness center: stay fit year-round in our onsite fitness center, which is equipped with free weights, cardio equipment, and flat screen TVs.', '- Location: close to many restaurants and lots of great shopping.', '- Utilities included: sewer, water and trash removal services (residents pay gas and electricity)', "- 9' ceilings", '- Beautiful structure and quality building materials', '- Built-in microwaves', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'River North is a 55 or better senior community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,38.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'River North', '10940 Crooked Lake Blvd NW', 'Coon Rapids, MN, 55433', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'qTXGRuEjwG8W']
